You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ X ▢
X X X ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ X ▢
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X

DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 grid with X's and empty squares. The top row has an X in the first and last position, with empty squares in between. The second row has an X in the first, fourth, and last position, with empty squares in between. The third row has X's in the first three positions, with empty squares in the last two. The fourth row has an X in the first, fourth, and last position, with empty squares in between
